nodes.text: A male duke or female duchess was a title of nobility. In many cases, this title was passed down through the family bloodline. The wife of a duke automatically became known as a duchess, regardless of family lineage, and vice versa.
Duchess Satine Kryze was a pacifist aristocrat hailing from Kalevala. During the Clone Wars, she ruled over the New Mandalorians.
Duke of Serenno was a title held by Rodas Borgin in 3 BBY.
Marcha of Mastigophorous was the Duchess of her family at the time of the First Corellian Insurrection.
His Grace the Duke Gadal-Herm's Safety Inspectorate manufactured Jedi Master Yoda's escape pod, and was presumably founded by Duke Gadal-Herm.
The Nyemarians were led by a duchess, who resided in the Nyemari Royal Palace.
